div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2370 Vitrolles, 20 km. NW of Marseille, 1905 Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 1000+ AR. Pot hoard Massalia: ob. Disposition: unknown Faudrin, Bulletin de la Société archéologique de Provence 1909, p. 450, no. 14 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 39
